item.description:
Many people consider Ansel Adams and his work an American treasure. This is a great opportunity for our group to see some of his famous and lesser know photographs with a guided tour. The $15 per person fee includes an all day entry pass to the museum. Please be ready to meet at 2:45. The tour should take about an hour and the museum closes at 5. Please also check the PEM website for specifics on what is opened, as the museum has recently begun renovations in some areas. We can head out afterward and grab a bite to eat for anyone interested.

Please feel free to contact me directly if you have any questions.  Looking forward to seeing you all!

Paul
item.name: Ansel Adams 'At the Water's Edge' at the Peabody Essex Museum
